scripts.build: NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" pnpm --filter ts-quantum build && NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" pnpm --filter @spin-network/graph-core build && NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" pnpm --filter qc-diffusion-frontend build
scripts.build:deps: NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" pnpm --filter ts-quantum build && NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" pnpm --filter @spin-network/graph-core build
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter "*" --parallel exec rm -rf dist build .next .nuxt out
